content: Get a Red Waypoint Pro has Stopped error every time I open the app.

I bought the app and it doesn't allow video with the Mavic Air 2. I sent an email to Red Waypoint with no response received. Your support sucks and I want my money back. I would have given 0 stars but that was not an option.
Almost perfect with mavic air 2. However the interval shot doesnt stop automatically
I have the purchased version and its top notch
Does not work on my a10s samsung Keeps shutting down Start ok but does not register or even give the option to register again Message register sdk failed

I fly a MA2, and as many of us have learned, DJI has not made Waypoints 2.0 a capability or functionality native in the firmware of the MA2. So, in order to gain similar functionality, with the ability to plot a path of waypoints on a Google map with numerous actions and parameters programmable on each waypoint, even offline (disconnected from drone) you can plan very intricate missions. I flown quite a few created missions myself so far and the learning curve is minimal. It's a great app! TY!!

Customer service is top notch. I had inquired on Mavic Air 2 compatibility and they emailed me immediately when it became compatible. I had a small issue with the program and it was on a weekend. I didn't expect to get a response until Monday. Got the error fixed the next day, (Sunday). Thank you
replyContent: Thank you very much for your 5-star review!!!

content: Updated and lt works great.
replyContent: Please update to v2.9.6 to solve this problem. Sorry for the inconvenience caused.

content: Mavic Mini: Waypoint missions only work randomly. Ramping is NOT smooth at all, it's the same as Stepped but in smaller increments. Gimbal interpolation to POI is NOT smooth. Interface: Does not look and work at all like DJI- and Litchi apps, is very confusing, not intuïtieve and needs a steep learning curve. Reply: Elevation speed and ramp angle are determined by AC speed and 3D-distance between 2 WPs. Gimbal interpolation controls vertical camera angle. Decreasing results in POI out of frame.
replyContent: Thanks for your feedback. Please check the new update for the Mavic Mini performance on waypoint missions. Regarding to ramp mode, it's necessary to adjust elevation speed and the ramp angle. To smooth the gimbal rotation decrease the max aircraft rotation speed in advanced settings. Check the user manual for learning deeply how to manage the APP.

content: Alhamdulillah di update versi yg baru waypoint untuk mapping dengan mavic mini berjalan sesuai expektasi....terima kasih

Decent app, is there a way to adjust the default altitude for waypoints? Using the draw tool to create a way point map creates a lot of markers to go in and adjust the altitude for each one individually!
replyContent: Hi Eoin, thanks for your feedback! Yes you can adjust the default altitude on the Default Waypoint settings menu. Change the waypoints settings before inserting them by Long Clicking on the Waypoint Insertion button. You can also override the current height for all waypoints in that menu. Use custom settings for increasing gradually the altitude.

content: Promising app. Waypoints work for mavic mini. Few bug here&there. Sometime drone not go start waypoint no matter press stop/play maybe restart phone,drone, remote also re-tap home point again. Sometime hover at waypoint start but not begin maybe solve by previous method or fly manual further and tap play. Simulation seem no effective/malfunction. When signal lost/ press RTH drone effective return home. Override mission by manual control is great. - Email service is badly poor! 4time no reply!
Would be nice if you catch to accomplish track mode on mavic mini. I know 1 app are doing it now but they dont uave waypoints yet...

MAVIC MINI を使っています。プロバージョンを購入し試しました。 オフラインでセットしたコースを、オンライン（本体、コントローラーまでつながった状態）で実行してみました。 途中で止まります。 waypoint1 までは必ず行くのですがそこで止まったり、waypoint2まで行って止まったり、、、ちなみに、止まるというのは、その場でホバリングをしつづけることです。 あと、仕様なのかもしれませんが、離陸まで自動ではありません。自分で離陸させてから、再生ボタンを押して自動飛行を実行する感じです。 このレビューを書いた時点では、まだ、miniの完成度が今一つなので、見送ったほうが良いと思います。 I use MAVIC MINI.In my case,it stops at waypoint1 or waypoint2 that means keep hovering.
replyContent: Hi Kazu, please update your Redwaypoint version to v2.9.2 this problem has been solved

content: Purchased Pro, start/stop recording does not work on my mavic mini..
replyContent: Hi Allan, if the Start/Stop action functionality does not work for you please report your problem to theredwaypoint@gmail.com including drone model and smartphone model and Android version and our experts will be able to assist you

content: Purchased pro, planned offline, then it doesnt recognize my P4's remote controller.
replyContent: Hi Joshua, please look at the user manual on how to connect the drone to Redwaypoint at www.redwaypoint.com/manual.html. If you need more help please contact to theredwaypoint@gmail.com

content: Purchased app, flew first day, been making missions up to test. Flawless and easy to use. Had the free trial version and it functioned well too. This does have a need of a user manual, but the website has tutorial videoes that really help. Also I sent a email to tech support and they answered questions and showed me where to find aid online. Well worth the price. Running it with a Phantom 3 standard.
replyContent: Thank you very much for your 5-star review!!!

replyContent: You need to register once, please make sure to have a good internet connection when starting for the first time the APP

Great to see the ability to insert waypoints added this time round. Awesome app, try the free version first to see if it works for you, it lets you work with 5 waypoints. I bought it after 2 trial runs that were excellent. (DJI Mavic Air)
So far, I love it! Great, intuitive layout. Have you considered providing an online mission planner like "Mission Hub"?
replyContent: Hi Eddie, Many thanks for your review! We are planning to import KML and KMZ files from Google Maps and Google Earth to Red Waypoint. But we will consider also your feature request for building a custom mission Hub.

content: I am now quite happy with this app. After some initial problems, and after receiving some help from the creators, I have found the app to be very useable and very accurate. The creators are now working on a user manual to go with the app.
replyContent: Hi Vern, thanks for updating your review. We will notify you by email as soon as the user manual is ready. Please feel free to ask any questions or suggestions to theredwaypoint@gmail.com

content: Excellent waypoint system for my DJI Spark. Perfect camera, waypoint grid layout for map surveying. Search (SAR) operations files can be created, saved, and executed within minutes. Instructions are still a little scarce only because, imo, Red Waypoint is still a new and improving drone app. Thank you!
replyContent: Hi Steve, thanks for your review. The user manual will be published soon!

content: This app is the best out there if your looking for grid flight plan. I found my lost drone using this app with my other drone. Well worth the money.

I really enjoy this app. I recommend making it so it adds each flight to my flight log in DJIgo4 or you add a feature that counts the flights using this app. user layout could use some work but I've been using it for the past week and starting to understand it more. what does the red X botton do on the right mid side of the screen?
replyContent: Hi Fred d, thanks a lot for your comment. We will consider your request of adding flight logs to DJIgo4 (Actually recorded on /DJI/RedWaypoint Folder). We are currently working on styling user layout. Use "X" button to clear all waypoints and "/" button to clear last waypoint. You can email theredwaypoint@gmail.com if you have questions or requests
